name: espn_scrape_scores
description: Scrape live and recent scores for a sport on ESPN. Returns up to 15 games with team names, scores, and game status.

steps.code: const games = []; document.querySelectorAll('[class*="Scoreboard"], [class*="scoreboard"], section[class*="ScoreboardPage"] > div, [class*="ScoreboardScoreCell"]').forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 15) { const teams = []; el.querySelectorAll('[class*="TeamName"], .team-name, [class*="truncate"], [class*="ScoreCell__TeamName"]').forEach(t => teams.push(t.textContent?.trim())); const scores = []; el.querySelectorAll('[class*="ScoreCell__Score"], [class*="Score"], .score').forEach(s => { const text = s.textContent?.trim(); if (text && /^\d+$/.test(text)) scores.push(text); }); const statusEl = el.querySelector('[class*="ScoreboardScoreCell__Time"], [class*="Status"], .game-status, [class*="ScoreCell__Time"]'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('a[href*="/game/"], a[href*="/gamecast/"], a[href*="/boxscore"]'); games.push({ teams: teams, scores: scores, status: statusEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', url: linkEl?.href || '' }); } }); return { sport: `{{sport}}`, game_count: games.length, games: games };
